column1: a miami dade county mayor calls energetic felling a process that relies on gravity to bring the building down . the demolition came after part of the building fell early in the morning on june 24 . crews immediately began digging through up to 16 feet of concrete and have confirmed at least 24 people were killed
column2: including children . search efforts at the partially collapsed building were paused saturday around 4 p.m. et sunday night .
